DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine relative bioavailability , safety tolerability SPARC001 Reference001 healthy , adult , male female subject
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study SPARC001 ( Study 2 ) Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adult , male female volunteer , 18 55 year age , inclusive , first CheckIn Visit 2 . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥18 ≤30 kg/m2 total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) Screening 3 . All female subject must negative serum pregnancy test Screening Checkin Visit 4 . Medically healthy basis medical history physical examination ( include limit evaluation cardiovascular , gastrointestinal , respiratory central nervous system ) , determine Investigator Screening CheckIn Visit . 1 . Females pregnant , lactating , likely become pregnant study 2 . Lifetime history and/or recent evidence alcohol drug/substance abuse disorder 3 . Subjects need maintain mental alertness throughout study 4 . Subjects determine investigator medical condition could jeopardize health prejudice result
